name: Viper GTS
overview: Viper GTS is a direct sequel to one of the stories included in Viper V-6, namely The Devil Came. In that story a frustrated man named Ogawa summoned the female demon Carrera and had to have sex with her until she was too tired to claim his soul. Now Carrera is back to hell, but the bored Ogawa summons her again. Only this time, she brings a partner: another sexy female demon named Mercedes. So now Ogawa has to satisfy their sexual needs. But the happy orgy is interrupted by the appearance of a new face - an angel from Heaven...
